short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See MAXG's insights and recommendations directly on your website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Eliminate The Guesswork From Marketing

Ditch The Dashboard. Go Beyond Data With The First AI-Powered Insight And Recommendation Engine

We’re drowning in data.
For agencies and in-house teams alike, data is a priority. It both drives decisions and measures results. But with so much information available, we’re overcome by indecision. The result is too much time wasted deciphering analytics, with no ROI to show for it.

The world’s first B2B sales and marketing recommendation engine, MAXG (Marketing Advisor for eXponential Growth), turns your data into direction. More than just another analytics dashboard, MAXG uses AI to deliver prioritized recommendations that eliminate the guesswork from marketing and drive results faster.
